name: AthenaSoft
description:
AthenaSoft is a product and software services company founded in 2015. Focussed around mobile app development using native sdks and cross-platform frameworks, it has seen phenomenal growth in recent times.
The team is an expert in VOIP, e-commerce, Social Networks, Multimedia and Health Apps. AthenaSoft's top priority is a great, intuitive, user friendly and eye-catchy UX/UI design, with robust modular implementations.
